lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons and Dragons. Yeah! Before we get started for the day, let's get into some of our quick announcements. First off, happy to be back. Me, Marisha, and Taliesin were gone for a better part of two weeks. We missed you guys. We actually met a few Critters around the desert with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were in Connecticut for a week, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Were they dressed up like they were from Marquet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Basically, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) It was really cool but we were happy to be back--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you want to burn this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Spice? Spice? Spice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spice? Spice? Spice? Do you spice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody spices at Burning Man. I'm pretty sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, he has work pushing later in the evening than normally would be, but he'll be joining us as soon as he possibly can. So he'll be on his way. Let's see, also a big round of applause for Liam running an awesome one-shot last week. Once again, well done, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just wanted to see Travis show his true self.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what you mean, sir.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No spoilers!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It worked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's great. Anyway, let's get back in the swing of things here. Announcements real fast if you want to start with this, Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! Our week's amazing episode is brought to you by Loot Crate! And their theme for this month, the month of September, is Speed. They've got amazing, high-octane titles like: Speed, Battlestar Galactica, Iron Man, Gone in 60 Seconds, Arrow, Batman, CW's The Flash, plus many more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The fastest things ever!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They got collectibles, a figure, and as always, a monthly t-shirt that looks amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It's always stylish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can get your hands on some of that sweet, nasty Loot Crate swag by going to www.lootcrate.com/criticalrole for $3 off your monthly subscription. You do it. You get it. And Goku's on the table. He stays--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because you bite Goku through the game. I don't understand it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's got pointy hair. I like chewing on things!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did this start last week and I missed it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If it's not that, it's pen or pencils. I digress. Loot Crate, thank you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Loot Crate: you can put it in your mouth!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You do! Probably shouldn't, but you can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha, did you want to talk a little bit about a cool thing we have coming up now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do. We have a new product that we're coming out with. We teamed up with our friends over at Espionage Cosmetics to come out with Critical Role nail wraps! We've got make-up now because that's how cool we are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They look really, really awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, and so there's some that are blue with our logo on them on silver. And then we have red ones that say "How do you want to do this?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like a blood red with a little bit of black splatter--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And they glow in the dark. What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They do?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, they do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shebang! This is the blood splatter one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And when you open the package, they're brought to you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you do it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I got this. I always rip them. But when you open it, they're from Gilmore's Glorious Goods.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh snap!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There he is on the inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, brought to you Gilmore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty fantastic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so awesome, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh. So yes, you can go get them right now. They are available tonight.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: In the store.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can go ahead and make sure your nails look absolutely glorious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we tried to make them like unisex because people like Taliesin like to rock the nail wraps.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes I do. I love rocking nail wraps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a feeling you would rock the nails, wouldn't you, Liam?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Unicorn sex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Anywho, also available in the store tonight is a plethora of new merchandise for you guys. I know we've had a lack of it lately. Okay, I've got to say it all because it's really exciting. Okay, we have these badges, they come in a set of five--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold your badges up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Badges?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're super awesome. So those are available right now, but they are limited.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you want to do this, Gilmore's Glorious Goods, the Slayer's Take.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the other thing that's limited? Oh, the nail wraps, right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, also there are Geek and Sundry nail wraps.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There also are some new Geek and Sundry nail wraps that have a blue and white thing and the little logo and I haven't seen if they're glow in the dark yet and I haven't looked yet, but I definitely have an outfit that these are going to work with so I'm taking these home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We also have the rings back in stock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't, baby, don't flip off everybody. So those we have a limited amount of-- Don't! I had a fly on my food.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, you really did roll a one!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This shit never ends.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those are limited. Also, something that's going to be in store for a long time is my favorite thing ever, the Critical Role mug. As seen on Blindspot by Patterson. Yeah, so we finally had these in the store and these are made to order, but they are going to stay in the store so order them and whatever. In addition to those, we have things on pre-order that are going to stay in the store for a couple weeks and that is this amazing bracelet. You can check it all out at the store. It's there right now. It says "How do you want to do this?" it's got our logo on it, how badass is that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We already have ours because they're amazing. It's got like a raised CR too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And these are on pre-order too. You know you can't see them on this shot, I'm sure it's not close enough, but you can go on the store and you can see an awesome view of them and they're enamel pins of our logo and also a "How do you want to do this?" So you can put them on your jean jacket or your backpack or your hat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like flair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like flair. You can wear them on your apron if you work at Bennigan's or TGI Fridays.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like in a high five, not in a bad way. Like slap hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's all the amazingness that we have.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These are sick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I know it's been slowly building and it's this sudden--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Making it rain!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All the shit. Live crit strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's Travis for the rest of the game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My OCD wife will slaughter me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I really will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good. It never ceases to be the strangest thing to see a phrase that I organically made up in my home game is now on patches and pins. It's so weird. That's so weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm glad that we finally have these. We had to fight to get these at Comic Con.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (phone notification beep)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who didn't silence their phone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's always Tal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's Sam, though!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, is he here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's heading this way in about 20 minutes, so he should be here 20 minutes after that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's just leaving El Segundo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right guys, that being the case, let's go ahead and bring it down unless we have any other announcements. Do we have anything else?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Negative.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. No, no, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through the continuous and perpetual threat of evil forces in the world, you found a hookah bar and got fuzzy drunk on a form of sandkheg-based liquor. You learned a bit about the city, about the culture, you learned from Jarett some good possible tips on how to engage with the people around the town.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, be pleased.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, be pleased.

lines.name: LIAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Beep-beep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you guys made your way towards the Cerulean Palace in the center of the city. After being balked by the Hand of Ord upon arrival you were then greeted by the Grand Maven and given entry to the Cerulean Palace. Upon passing up a large translucent blue tower, above the city of Ank'Harel-- not Emon, I was tired--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We knew what you meant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, I figured you guys would be all right with that. And eventually opened into a central chamber at the very top of this tower that overlooks the majority of the desert from this position that you can see. There were large windows across the entirety of this circular room, there was a raised platform in the center, balcony across the opposite way, and sitting atop this throne in the center made of brass and sapphire you met an individual, seemingly the ruler for a long time of this city. The androgynous long-living figure known as J'mon Sa Ord. And that is we're picking up this--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the Grand Maven took us up there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we saw him and we met him, right? He was like "hello."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just greeted you when we left off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He knew who we were.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is my pleasure to greet you," and gave you a soft bow. "Your arrival has not escaped my "whispers and I'm curious if your presence means what I think it means."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you think it means exactly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have heard our skyport access to Emon was balked by dragon attack. I would hope the problem "would be sorted by now for the purposes of our vast trade network. And you've arrived, I hope "with good news."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah, it's like a mixed bag. A little good, a little bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hmm, I'd say it's mostly bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's mostly bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's good news in progress.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hmm, mostly bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My version of good news in progress.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are making headway. We've taken down one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a problem that, as far as I know, has never been accounted for in the history of civilization. The dragons are cooperating with one another. We are fighting not one dragon, but a conclave of dragons. All cooperating towards the destruction and sublimation of man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It seems as if this is an extermination.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mostly successful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mostly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They mostly come at night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mostly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They plan at dawn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you say these dragons are working together, attacking and destroying. I assume they "are of the chromatic origin then?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What else can you tell me of this threat?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A great ancient red one known as the Cinder King is sitting on Emon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He appears to be their leader.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He was released somehow from the Plane of Fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By a green dragon, Raishan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Raishan. I do not recognize this name. What is the name of the red you speak of, this Cider King?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thordak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (scoffs) I recall this name. A foolish drake from "the Scaldwind Sands who saw, unwisely, to threaten my domain many years ago. We cut his heart and "watched him sink beneath the ocean. This creature you speak of, I do not think it is the same "Thordak."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why wouldn't it be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because I watched him die."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! But our Thordak, he has like this thing that is at the center of his chest right? It's like a jewel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's replaced his heart, potentially.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And if you sliced his original maybe he upgraded.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or perhaps someone brought him back to life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not unheard of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So this beast that harries you, you are certain it goes by the name Thordak?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Certain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What proof do you have of this being the same beast?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Other than his heart obviously having been previously maimed in some way, we have no proof that it could be the same beast. We were not here. But even if it isn't the same beast, the fact that a dragon takes its name should trouble you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we've heard of your success before and were hoping you could offer us a little guidance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is an old dragon--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Thordak that came to war here was not quite as large and powerful as you seem to "say this one is."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long ago was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This was centuries ago, the city was but maybe 100, 150 years at the time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He could have grown by then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I'm afraid we're not talking about a drake anymore, we're talking about an ancient, full-grown dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God knows how time works in the Fire Elemental Plane, he may be much older than time has allowed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With respect, you were here centuries ago?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The creature known as J'mon Sa Ord, they steeple their fingers and glance over to you-- at head height with you practically, even stepping down from the platform.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have been here for some time, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got to get your diet sometime, that's amazing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, in general it is impolite to query the age of any being. In general.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have assumed you would know that by now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (stammers) Beep-beep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The arms go from a steepled position to a cross and now a look of curiosity comes across their face. "If this is truth, then how do you plan to fell this everburning worm?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is the question, isn't it? We're collecting items. Vestiges of power. Hopefully with them in tow, we will be able to gather armies to combat Thordak. We know we can't take him on alone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're also gathering allies and we've already destroyed several of his companion dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, a couple.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we did recon on a third.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Preparing to kill a white dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So am I to understand that you are spearheading this endeavor?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well. It's sort of unofficially.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're as surprised as anyone, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, we didn't necessarily ask for this, it just fell in our lap.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It fell on our city, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's true. Our keep came crashing down on around us and then we were committed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, then what do you want from J'mon Sa Ord?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps, if it comes to it, a little bit of help possibly collecting the Vestige that we are looking for in this city, that we are currently, hopefully, collecting and being on our way with, causing as little noise in the city as humanly possible. We are aware that is complicated for people like us. And perhaps an ally in the coming battles to come. It may, I would imagine, please you to perhaps meet these dragons on foreign shores as opposed to in your city walls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's only a matter of time. If we can't defeat them in Emon, he will spread his territory.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it is the dragon that you remember, he will come here, and if it isn't the dragon you remember, the fact that he took that name means that he will come here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This city is well protected. I am not worried about this dragon or dragons you speak. I "am protector here and we are warded against such threats."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you would like to awaken trade with Emon again, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This does interest me as there is quite a stake in the roads we've built with Tal'Dorei."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything you can share with us from your encounter back then? It would help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The creature once known as Thordak had begun to grow tired of his meager dominion in the "Scaldwind Sands, began to reach out with his many feral kobold armies and various serpentine "followers, decided that the very jewel of our city was perhaps a good throne to sit upon. And, much to "its foolish intent, attacked not knowing what it was after. We struck down its armies and for two "weeks there was battle between the skies of here and the northern mountains before we took a fell "strike against the beast. It escaped to the north and attempted to flee beyond the ocean's waters, "but we caught up to it, struck it down, and watched it fall into the fathoms. If this is the "same beast you say, then it is uncanny it could survive such an encounter and would say it is even "more dangerous having learned from these past struggles."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think you simply wore it down or was there some angle you used?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have my ways. We have our ways. Well, you wish my aid?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You go running into the furnace and you wish me to be at your side?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we don't run into the furnace willingly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or hastily.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The furnace is the only exit. We wish to just borrow an asbestos coat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm." There's a brief pause as J'mon looks past and seems to peer through each of you, scanning back and forth with those strange smoldering pupils.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, I have watched many of your kind with "these same traits waltz into oblivion before. I will not risk myself or my city by backing a "fool's whim. Show me what you are capable of, fellows of Vox Machina. Show the Soul of the "Desert Jewel what you are capable of." And J'mon Sa Ord begins to step back-- (mechanical whirring)

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What strange powers do you wield?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's using a hydraulic pump! He's an imagineer!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's omnipotent!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's animatronic!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was like the best sound cue ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the cracking and the rumbling of something in the distance as J'mon Sa Ord steps back and fades from view.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a latching of stone behind you as it seems the Grand Maven has stepped back into the platform you arrived in and closed it behind you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another loud crack hits the air around you (loud grinding) and you watch as, over past the other side of the room where the balcony stands, a looming shadow plummets out from seemingly the sky itself and lands, smashing onto the marble floor of the exterior, its silhouette humanoid, but swollen, across the sunlight that's pushing past from beyond.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sam is here, somebody go get Sam! Sam's at the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blue dust and pebbles tumble across the archway from the balcony to your side coming to rest. The shape squeezes through the balcony arch into the room. What you see is a thick-limbed silhouette marching into the throne chamber, a 15-foot-tall armored structure of intricate decorated cobalt plates and iron bulk dragging a massive cleaver-like blade with one arm and a clenched boulder-like fist in the other. Two burning white flames flare as eyes within its solid helmet. I need you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Man, you just got back in town!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just got here!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fetch the gnome!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The gnome is just in time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And a map?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't we have Fassbender with us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, where is Fassbender?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fassbender is busy being a good guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fassbender's with Wilhand.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam, we're all going to die!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We just rolled initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I have some questions for the leader of-- oh, what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Some shit went down, he asked us--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know. I'm with this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I brought you some stickers from Burning Man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently the character minis were not brought to the table. Be with you in a moment when those arise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got to shake off that Burning Man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's like a big iron samurai.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is everything I've ever hoped for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy wishes he created that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am definitely having a little bit of Tony Stark porn moment right now. I want to wear it like a suit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Initiative orders. 25 to 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anybody? 25 to 20?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, let me roll this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, let me see. Oh, I think he got something good. No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you roll? What did you roll, Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 to 20. No one? 20 to 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I was wrong. 14. I added wrong. Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you get, Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, right. Okay, so Vax, Percy, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That thing is huge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 15 to ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 14 as well! All right, here we go. And then a fucking 20 again as soon as I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings dramatic music)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The sound of you slowly dying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are those clear blocks? Are those glass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those are the windows.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's like the DND version of those awful glass bricks from the 80s.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, 12?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right and what did you get again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And he's a test? We're not to kill anyone else in the room?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think he's real, we just have to kill him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the entity bursts its way into the room, its flaming eyes flare. Vax, you have the beginning of this encounter, what do you want to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Going to click the boots together and I'm going to slide over this way, between those two windows I'm closest to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. All the way to the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the way to the wall?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) To the windows!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to dagger and dagger and dagger him. Okay, first one is 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second one-- Balls! It's 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is this your last Luck of the day? Because you haven't rested.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's two. That's my second. I've been checking them off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second? Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The third one is 24 as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what was it? 24?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was 24, 15 or 16, and 24 again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So second one misses. The first and last hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First and last. Okay. Give me the pyramid and I go and get nine, plus I have advantage so I get sneak attack, so that's nine plus 14, 19, 20, 26, 30-- 36 for the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the second gets ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 46 points of damage, first round of attacks from Vax. Well done. The blades hit and streak off, and you can see portions of the iron plates between the cobalt armor seem to have carved grooves into them and it's actually made an impact on the outside of the creature. That end your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That ends my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to, first of all, cast Hex on this creature.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Attaboy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks for the reminder, because now I'm going to do Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Going to cast my Hex and then I'm going to start gentle. I'm going to take three shots with the Retort pistol, including the first one is going to be an attempt at a headshot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's a burn a grit. Come on, I know it's been two weeks. Don't be angry. Don't be a cat, be a dog, just be happy to see me. And it's happy to see me! That's a 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And he has disadvantage on strength checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Disadvantage on strength checks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And he has to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That is a 22.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't like him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note: the first shot, it hits the head and bounces off, seemingly no effect. There's a little bit of necrotic seep into the armor that seems to have affected it to a small extent, but the bullets seem to have almost no effect on its form.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But Liam's did?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, yeah, Liam's not doing piercing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes he does, he does piercing damage. But it seemed to get through less than--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Magic?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are your bullets not magic?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The bullets are not magic. My bullets are bullets!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe it's because they're projectiles?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, good to know! That could go really poorly!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he made of metal? Or is he a big dude in a metal suit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's good to know. I'm going to take another shot at the helmet for a headshot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Spread. Out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where? I don't even see where we are!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're over there, in front of the throne.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 hits!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Better! 16 points of piercing damage, three points of necrotic. And another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution saving throw. That is an 18.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He now has disadvantage on attacks until the end of his next turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This one does hit the head, and it seems to knock it off to the side and one of the flames flutters for a second, but leaves no impact or damage against the helmet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are kidding me. So is it fair to say that 16 points of damage didn't happen?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the moment, I'm blowing bullets not for damage; I'm blowing bullets for effect at the moment. This is all effect-based, I'm not trying to damage him right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) She blinded me with science!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) Blinded me with science! I have one more shot, so I guess I'm going to take it. And for shits and giggles, I'm going to take a Sharpshooter shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck me. 19. 27?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 21 points of piercing damage, four points of necrotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Once again it ricochets off with a flash of sparks and energy. You can see the necrotic seems to have left this slight burn against the plate, but the bullet has left no groove in the armor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, that's cool. I'm putting the gun down, and I'm going to back up. I'm going to pull to my left. And I'm going to try and get against the wall, not the glass!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. End of your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: End of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's time to wake up, boys and girls! So I would like to rage. Am I in front of the throne? That's me, right? That big, proud fuck over there? Can I run as far as my little feet can carry me, over in front of Percy and more towards along the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so. (counting) 50 is where you can get right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's cool. I'm cool with that. I'm not in front of that window, right? More in front of the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just to the right of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, sweet. May I attach the Chain of Returning to my bloodaxe, and throw it at said giant bastard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may! What is the range on it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Is that right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's not right. I thought it was 30, it's a pretty short distance to throw it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, is it? I don't have it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like a thousand feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're a little rusty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How tall would you say this guy is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy? 15 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's 15 feet tall, Grog. 15 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bonus action: athletics strength check provided to pull the thing out. No distance. It's even laminated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's a 30-foot distance, just like most throwing weapons would be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it. You know what? Since I'm raging, I take out the Javelin of Lightning and I'll throw that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And that's a four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, is this is the dice that was fucking you last week!?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I've got a lot to-- no, it's not! Don't start with your juju. It's 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. As you throw the javelin, it hits the shoulder pauldron and scrapes off, firing out of the balcony, and over the edge

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Accio Lightning Javelin. He just lost the Lightning Javelin out the window.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus. We'll get it later, we'll go get it later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's what you get for playing with it in the house.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That ends my turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, Steve!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I'm all right!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. It is now the cobalt golem's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I like how we're clustered right there. It's fun, it's really fun. Yay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It turns around. The blade isn't getting ready to fight, instead its flames curl up and darken, and you watch as its neck opens up to this dark space underneath and it (roars). This fume of purplish blue mist seems to spill out in front of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no, he's reaching for something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! Area of effect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As he attacks, can I use Cutting Words to reduce the attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Scanlan, do that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are more than welcome to try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you use your Cutting Words.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I say to him, oi! Your face is so ugly I'm considering casting Blindness on myself so I don't have to look at it! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll the dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A ten or an eight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: d10, it's whatever your bardic inspiration is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Has no affect on it, unfortunately. All right, I need Vex, Keyleth and Scanlan to make constitution saving throws.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! I hate constitution saving throws!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not terrible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got a natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damn, all right!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 17 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This is a lot of dice I've got to roll here, so let me--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! How many is a lot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) So as the poisonous fumes fill the space, you can feel it burning the outside of your skin, filling your lungs. You guys start coughing as the horrible burning sensation in your interior begins to fill your entire experience right now. Scanlan, you manage to pull aside and close your nose just in time, but it still burns your exterior. You take 26 points of poison damage, Scanlan. That is 55 points of poison damage to both Vex and Keyleth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On a 19? I didn't save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 DC. You missed it by one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you say 55? That just dropped me by half my hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, basically me too. More than half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end its turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he within five feet? Can I get away from him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you, Travis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One more rogue level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hope that he doesn't hit me and I'm going to try and run away from him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He has disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, does he?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, he has disadvantage on swinging at you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does, yes. So as you start rushing away, the one lax arm holding the cleaver goes (cleaver slamming) and comes down over her head like a giant, thick, three-and-a-half-foot-wide blade of solid iron. With disadvantage, that's 25 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa! This is a powerful fighter!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He hits me. Watch me die right now!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's right, we're not ready. We're stupid assholes, oh God!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to do drugs in your lounges for the rest of our lives.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If he kills me right now, I'm going to be so pissed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you want to move?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my dear lord! I'm going to run around behind the throne but I'm going to shoot him as I'm doing it. I'm going to shoot him from there and then I'm going to keep going. But I'm going to shoot him with-- hopefully, the lightning actually does something, because I'm going to shoot him with the Lightning Arrow. And I'm doing it at a fourth level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I roll. Attack as normal. Okay. Oh no! Shit, what is that? 22? 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's normally 4d8, but you did it at a higher level, so it's 5d8 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, why was it higher? Did you do it at a higher level?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 points of lightning damage. The lightning streaks into it as the arrow hits and the lightning begins arcing through its armor. It bursts outwards. Keyleth, I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit! Keyleth, I'm so sorry!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because she's within ten feet of the creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's fine. I'm good. Dexterity save?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's a fucking lightning arrow, I never use it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. You take nine points of lightning-- no, it's 2d8. So you roll 2d8 damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does my spell resistance armor help with this? I've got advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just eight little old points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does my advantage from spell resistance on my armor help with this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is technically a spell--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So can I roll again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's better! 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yes, you take half damage. So take four points of lightning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! See, that's nothing!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Feels good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now you feel alive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm awake.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to keep running and go behind the throne.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get at 30 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You can get over there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Knowing you and your movement situation, you would have probably taken the more direct route because you were going to get hit regardless.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So lightning radiated off of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it did not hurt him at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The lightning hurt him, it arced through him and it seemed to react to the impact.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's metal. He's made of metal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, before I go, because I wasn't in the room, did J'mon Sa Ord say this is a test?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He said, show me what you can do.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Show me what you've got!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm out of range so he can't swipe me as I walk away, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you know. It's a long blade.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I'll stay put.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw the blade slam down towards Vex and it slammed a few inches away from you so you're right on that maybe/maybe not edge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere to trap the beast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go, Scanlan!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me pull this up real fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please let this work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's a good plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's enough to heal up and get ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is technically a Huge creature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's Huge, I thought you said he was 15 feet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 feet tall. He himself is about 15 or so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groans dramatically)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A Medium creature's about six to seven feet average. A Large creature is about ten to 12.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have perfectly huge balls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have big balls, not Huge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're Large or smaller.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as soon as you start casting the spell you look at the size and think, this isn't going to fit in one of my spheres.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so I ditch that. And because I saw lightning work I'm going to-- well, then I'm going to have to move. Can I hit him now without hitting Keyleth or do I have to move for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can because he's wide enough you can go that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just Lightning Bolt, then. Level three Lightning Bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. With advantage on its save, that is a 16 dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, against your Lightning Bolt, to see if it manages to dodge out of the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does my Cutting Words affect that at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Cutting Words is to reduce the attack of another creature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but because I'm armed with Mythcarver, when I use it, my target gets disadvantage on his next saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, its saving throw is still a 16, your DC is way higher, it failed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a big creature, it's not very dexterous. It can't dodge quickly, it's like (groaning), it's like a small moving tank.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So 8d6 then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You shake from the nearby impact, your body still a little numb from the previous electrical hit. It blasts the front as the arc from Vex's attack begins to wear off, this time the energy coursing through its entire body. You can see as it tries to lift the blade up for another attack it almost drops the blade from the impact, but it stays firm and shrugs it off, but you can see the darkened period across its body where the electric bolts are beginning to take effect across its physical form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll use that opportunity to back away and hope it doesn't get me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You back away, and you're out of range for it to try to make a strike at you. You can keep moving if you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'll go all the way to the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the way to the wall?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but not the glass. God, who's coming up next? I will inspire Grog, he hasn't happened yet, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Grog's coming up soon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But while Kevin laughed, Grog sliced him in half And said, "These are mine now, fuckles!" (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those are all words that you can kind of understand! So you take your inspiration dice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like how his name was Kevin halfway through the limerick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuckles. Is that a d10 or a d12?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: d10. So that's the end of your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is all I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, seeing that the lightning is doing some damage, I am going to cast Call Lightning at fourth level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take a step back first, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He'll get a swipe at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a five foot square.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, this is true, but at disadvantage he still got me at 25 before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, but you're ten feet away though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just five feet, I want to shift back five feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do that without getting a swipe, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's already used his reaction to strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm going to cast Call Lightning, fourth level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Keyleth's concentrating, her eyes fog over white. What are you going to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right on his head!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Keyleth focuses, she brings her arm down and one singular bolt coalesces, strikes down right onto his head. What's the DC on the spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's got a minus one on his dex save. He's a slow guy. So he takes 3d10 lightning damage. Go ahead and roll that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 4d10 because I cast it at fourth level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, 4d10, because it's fourth level.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got 500 hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got so many.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three, six, not great. Eight, so make that-- what's six plus eight? 14 plus five, 19 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 points of lightning damage strikes into its head, and you see it has to fall back onto its back leg to right itself, and its growling sounds like creaking of metal and stone against each other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And with that, I'm going to use my free action to go earth elemental form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bonus action, you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "My free action!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that what you said? "My free action! Yeah!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did I sound like Mickey? Did that happen?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Mickey Mouse voice) I'd like to use my bonus action to go earth elemental!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the growling sound of stone and metal seems to vibrate the floor, you step back and hulk out into your elemental form, almost returning a similar earth-against-stone growl back at it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There she is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you allow me to use my bonus action to go stealth and quietly run over using my hasted speed to get over to my sister behind that stone thingy in the middle of the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could certainly try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I'd like to try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four, five, six. one. Get behind there, go ahead and roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'll use my last Luck of the day, though. Fine. 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Far as you know, it doesn't see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'd like to curve around by my sister and use sharpshooter to throw two daggers as hard as I can at him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Why are you going to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I want to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! He's going to aim at me!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First one is a 26. 25. And the second one misses, it's a natural one. With sharpshooter. Oh no. 26, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. These are with which blades?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is with dagger of venom and flame tongue. So the flame missed, dagger hit. Excuse me, venom hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, okay. So you throw. Go ahead and roll damage for the dagger of venom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it a sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does not seem to see you, so yes, you are rolling damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. So it's plus ten because I used sharpshooter. So one, seven plus ten is 17. That's the 20, 23, 27, 32, 37, 40.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40! Nice! 40 points of piercing damage as this one dagger hits one of its front chest plates and causes it to dislodge and hang to the side, and it's hanging by some sort of interior bolted circumstance. You can see a bunch of iron mechanisms that are holding it together, some almost clockwork, some appear to be arcane in nature and are being held aloft by sparking whitish-blue energy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have five feet of movement left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have about 15 feet of movement.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to slink right behind the thing so I'm out of range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, good! Good job, thanks. So you hit him and he looks over and I'm standing there. It's the best. That's the best move. Ever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't hear any of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm right behind you, you did hear it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was longer than six seconds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of Vax's turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I can see the damage that this thing has taken. Would it be possible to target the wound? I'd be happy to burn a grit to target the mechanisms and not the armor. Try and get a chunk of metal in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. First thing I'm going to do is I'm going to take a couple steps to the right and try and shove my elbow on that glass to see what it feels like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a really pretty display for the brief moment that you glance out the corner of your eye at it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just wanted to see how strong it felt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty strong.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Like high-rise glass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to pull the rest of my movement the opposite direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, don't stand in front of a window.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would not work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Obviously. Obvs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope, rolled 18 on both! So 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a-- (high-pitched giggling) I'm a pretty, pretty princess. 21, 31, 37. 37 points of piercing damage and five points of necrotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gun firing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you fire Bad News you can see the smoke and dark mist that fires at the front of its barrel from the Hex, the heavy bullet goes into the opening in the chest that was given by Grog and you hear it bouncing around inside, seemingly not really doing any damage to the interior of the creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still well-aimed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I reload.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And shoot yourself in the face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck it, I am Aquaman in this fight, I'm well aware.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take that sword out, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to burn another grit. Oh, yeah, no, I am, but I'm trying to be helpful in the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you fire, reload, and for your--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is my third and final shot, I'm going to take an arm shot, I'm going to try and get it to drop its toy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (counting) Sorry, I can't count. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. So the bullet ricochets off the hand, doing no damage to it, but what's the DC on--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Normal damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My bullets do no damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your bullets do no damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But you still get necrotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One point of necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The DC is 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 19? Okay, that brings it to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength, okay, that is a 17.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He drops it. I yell out, somebody get that thing away from him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the bullet slams into its hands, its fingers, against its own will, are pried open from the blast, a little bit of poof of smoke off to the side. And the giant blade, which is about, I'd say, seven and a half feet long, clatters to the ground. That thing probably weighs quite a bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I put my gun away and I'm done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's the end of your turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I run, using a mixture of horizontal and diagonal movements, to run straight at Iron Giant?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. (counting) And you have two more squares of movement you can do if you want.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I want to get right up on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you're right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I put myself on the opposite side of him from the window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to, since I have two attacks, I would like to try to shove him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. This is what I was going for, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a 20 on the die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's only one size larger than me, so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's two sizes larger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In an effort to show off our Vestiges of Divergence, I'd like to retcon this and smash my Knuckles together and use the Enlarge to grow to incredible size.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you see me, angel guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To ridiculous size!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you rush forward, towards it, you slam your gauntlets together. As you get towards it you begin to swell in size, your strides getting longer and longer. By the time you approach it, you are right there. You are now one size category larger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mighty Joe Young, bitch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Push him out the window, Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so you are attempting to make a shove attack. Okay. You push it away from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, a strength check against either his strength or dexterity, it's the target's choice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He also has disadvantage on strength checks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he's going to choose dexterity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, his dexterity is fucking awful. So you go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, which I get advantage on. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23? With disadvantage it's 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! How far can you throw him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only five feet, or knock him prone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Knock him prone!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'd like to knock him--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm not there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to knock him prone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Live your dreams.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush forward, and leaning the axe to the side, you get low as it attempts to grab out and punch towards your head. Reach down and grab it from behind the ankle and then lift up, throwing its leg up over and it goes tumbling backwards, crashing onto its back on the ground, its limbs loosely flailing, trying to find some sort of purchase on the floor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have another attack, if you want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And because he's prone, does that give me-- no, I don't know. Reckless. I hit him with the axe!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight. Eight again. Fuck you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got inspiration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I don't need it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, fuck, what did I say.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22? Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, sir. My brain don't work so good. 19 plus one point of necrotic damage for 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 points of damage as you bring the axe down with both hands, whack! Right into the center of its chest armored cavity. You can see the axe fits about halfway, almost to the center of the handle itself into the chest and you have to work it back and forth to wedge it out of its metal hide. The axe is back in your grasp, and you can see a giant gash mark where it was left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it felt that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you feel Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's armored, it's got a heavy armor on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Grog, end of your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That ends my turn. You know Grog always leaves his mark, player.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now the golem's turn. Ah, look at that, it rolled a six. So it recharges its poison breath.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't say that so willy-nilly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it stands up in its space, using half its movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hate how confidently he's saying that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The helmet opens up from underneath and you can see that giant black vacuous space in the center of its throat. It lets another torrent of it forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Oh! Tell me I'm just out of reach!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. You're in reach.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking shitballs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need Keyleth, Grog, and Vex to make constitution saving throws.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) It doesn't matter, even with a save I'm going to die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am immune to poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're immune to poison?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I'm a big earth elemental.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have resistance to poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So what's your constitution saving throw, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. All right. That fails, unfortunately, but you still take half damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because of the belt of dwarvenkind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. So with a full roll there. All right. Grog, you take 25 points of poison damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you take none because of your earth elemental form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 50 points of poison damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome. I'm unconscious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you say 50?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm straight up on the ground. I feel like Matt, he wants me to die. He makes me unconscious in every fight now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who, that golem?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were there!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope. Matt wants me to die, I can feel it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, we have this really great idea of what to do with Trinket once you're--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, let's not! Okay? Let's not!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To be fair, you've spent 90% of the game flying way away from everything you've ever fought, so maybe it's about time it caught up to you a little. All right. That ends the golem's turn. Vex, I need you to make a death saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus fucking fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll one of the good ones? Which one will it be, of the 90?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which child will disappoint you today?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, I failed it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So mark off one failed death saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shitballs. Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Ends your turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will heal Vex'ahlia.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I 30 feet away or closer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are further away from her. You are currently off to that side. You are 40 feet from her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, then I will walk 11 feet closer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will use Healing Word to heal her. I'll sing to her (singing) Up, up and away on your beautiful, your beautiful broom! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, it's a bonus action so I can't go very high with the level, can I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go as high as you want on the bonus action, whatever spell you cast as your main action can't be higher than level two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As my

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the spells has to be level two, the other can be any level it wants to. That's how it works.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got it. Well, then I'll do this one at level two, and I can do anything for my main action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Level two!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So that's 2d4 plus six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I roll? I roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One, two--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it! Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you heal seven hit points, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you roll seven?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I rolled two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it's eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, then eight. You're at eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six? I thought it was plus five? Well, whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus six now because your charisma went up by one, buddy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh that's right! I got to mark that down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you should. The soothing words of Scanlan Shorthalt pull you from unconsciousness as your eyes begin to focus downward. You're looking out past the balcony and you can see bits of dust being scattered across the ground and you hear the heavy footfalls of your friends and the golem behind you as suddenly you're like, Oh shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I cough out blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Scanlan, you still have 15 more feet of movement. Or ten more feet, technically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go back to right where I was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get close to it at least. Right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And shit. Shitballs. Shit. Shitballs fucking shit. I will use (singing) Bigby's Hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, did you add your 1d4 points of damage for your enlarged state? In your attack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll 1d4. Add that. When you're enlarged you do an additional 1d4 with any weapon attacks because the weapon got larger as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. All right. So what are you doing Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bigby's Hand is going to make a huge fist, fly forward, and smash the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Behind?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Behind him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck yes. Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's what I'm talking about!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. We're all on the same page. I'm so proud of us you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's have Bigby's Hand make a melee spell attack against the glass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Melee spell attack. Well, that's cocked. 12 plus what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus your spell attack bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. Without an issue the fist appears behind the golem, fists up, and is about to punch it in the back of the head when, last minute, it whirls around and slams into the glass. Go ahead and roll 4d8 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 4d8. I only have 1d8. 13 plus eight. 21. No! 22. No! What is it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 21! Holy shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had it right. The window shatters, comes clattering down, and suddenly the wind begins to pick up into the room. At this high a point, all the silks are now whirling around. The storm at the top that Keyleth is holding is starting to meet the turbulence and the lightning bolts are beginning to course through it even heavier. Right now it's pretty heavy winds coming through here regardless, so a lot of you are having to keep--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I use any action to take off my hat and let my hair flow, Matthew Mercer style?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. I'll give you that. Like a fantastic 1991 rock video.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) I don't want to wait for our lives to be over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Grog's sort of out of my way--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just bring it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to full on linebacker style go for this guy, and we're going out the fucking window.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm going to take him, tackling him out the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're going to go ahead and do a shove attack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, that is what I'm going to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So much strength disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Such hassle. Too much hassle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Do it, giant earth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shove out window, fighting too much hassle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, if we can't kill it we can all kill ourselves out the window.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What am I doing? I'm an earth elemental, so is that just strength?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so add plus five to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 18. And with disadvantage that is going to be 22. So as you rush forward and slam into it, it puts its hand out and takes the blow, and it screeches a couple inches, but it's still too heavy for you to get it forward. You have two slam attacks, as part of it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can I do it again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do it again if you want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's try this again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll a d20 and add five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, big money-- ugh! No. Just no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll? What's the total.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled seven total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a seven and then a one. So as you pull back with your other fist and you slam it square into the center of the one plate that's still visible, you hit it, and using all your might, looking over at Grog to get a little inspiration, you grin at him with this horrible earthy smile as you watch as it scrapes across the floor of the throne room being pushed back right there, five feet. All right. That ends your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to, like a hasted spider monkey, scrabble along the floor really low and flank the thing opposite Keyleth and stab it in any gears I see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got wings!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First attack is a 17. Second attack misses, it's a natural one. Third attack is a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 17?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's advantage on all the attacks because I'm flanking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you are flanking, it is advantage on the attacks, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Advantage on all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So the first one was a 17.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And now you have one more roll for the second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One more roll for the second is a 13. And then the third attack--holy cow--is a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the first two miss, the last one hits. The blades are (screeching) streaking across it. Which dagger is this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did I say before? Nine plus six, 15, 18, 24, 25, 31, 37, 40 again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40 points of piercing damage. First two blades strike and make no mark whatsoever on its hide. However, the second one does manage to pull apart and open this slight piece where you see a number of its giant iron central torso pieces emerging. You see a slight seam there where they've been welded together. You take that moment to pull back your dagger of venom and slip it as hard as you can right into that groove. As it does, it sinks right to the hilt and the creature flexes its back in pain. (groaning)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to guess I have a little bit of movement left, and I don't care if he swings at me. I'm going to back into the corner between the hole and the window that's still in one piece.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, all the way to the wall. Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it disadvantage, though, from Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not anymore, that only lasts for a round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll use Uncanny Dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 points of bludgeoning damage, 60 points of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 60 points?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 points of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With Uncanny Dodge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (heavy breathing) Catch your breath there on the side. That ends your turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm kind of useless.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't say that!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a few steps to my left so I have a good, clear shot at it towards the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To your left here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. More. Yeah, there. That'll do. I'm going to keep blowing through in the hope that I get a crit because then I regain a grit. I'm going to pull out Bad News and start firing to see if I can throw it off its aim.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you grit farming right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm grit farming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're totally grit farming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm fucking grit farming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're grit farming-- okay, go for it. So Bad News is reload, attack, reload.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not Bad News, it's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's Retort you're pulling out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, Retort, it's off-balance so I'm trying to find a place where-- give it some momentum to fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have one more shot, a reload, then a shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have one more shot, a reload, and a shot. Two shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hit, so that I might as well just roll--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just roll the necrotic damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's six points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of necrotic damage? All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And again. 21? Oh, 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20. Not natural 20. It misses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It misses. The bullet goes past the armor and ends up hitting the side of the wall and cracks some of the marble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just trying to grit farm at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Staying where you are?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know? It occurs to me that this battle's going to be over soon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's wishful thinking!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why would you throw that out there?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great way to hear God laugh is to announce your plans.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Point!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: After seeing Vex fall and then Scanlan lift her up and then Vax get slammed into the wall and Keyleth showing up in this very attractive form, I would like to reckless attack, and for a bonus action, go into a frenzied rage for a third attack, and use all three to try and push him out the window.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make three athletics checks. First one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get it son!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there. Now, as part of the shove, my question, I have to see if you get to move into its space afterward because, right now, it's out of your range.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a good question. I could move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Double-check this one more time.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: This. Is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ank'Harel!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we notice any rocket boosters on its heels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have plenty of movement. You push it back, you move in to get within range there. Go ahead and make another.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27, that is a 17.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pushed back, it's right up to the edge now, its shoulders dropped against the edge. Its blade is still on the ground. Do you move in and go for a final one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check one more time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's good! 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because I love 300, I look at him and I say, (yelling) This. Is. Vox Machina! And kick him in the chest out the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As your swollen, giant goliath foot slams into the front, you see the metal plate that's dangling and the one that's still there cave inward, sparks fly as the inner workings of it are jammed with its own armored plate. Its arms reach out and scrape and break off the sides of the walls as it falls backward and tumbles out of sight. You glance over and look down as you watch it plummet.
