lines.text: No one even fucking wants it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean when you're using it in food.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it comes--" and he goes through like a small spice rack on the side of the kitchen, comes back out and pulls out a small glass container. He uncorks the top and inside you can see it's a very fine dark brown powder. He says, "It comes in bits but you grind it down and then "you sprinkle it over, cook it proper, usually with slow roasts, and it's quite nice."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks, Treev.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No worries."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'm good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Enjoy that allspice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go on our journey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We buying more drugs today?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I think my kingpin days are over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is sad to hear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Off to the Crystal Chateau, then?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Off to the Crystal Chateau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's leading the charge to the Crystal Chateau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We ask Treev first: where is the Crystal Chateau?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where most of all the bastards live and "most of the training's done by the Allegiance folk."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The bastards live, you said?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they're snobby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My pleasure."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be back in a bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Meep-meep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll lead the charge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, for the love of god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you finding anything, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six. What'd you roll?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the southern side of it you do see a large multi-tiered structure that is made of a smoky quartz mixed with white marble in places. This, with an immediate glance, you'd probably gather is the Crystal Chateau.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the opalescent stone have any similarity to the stones of Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't use the opalite dice. Opalite hates us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There we go. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a moment, glance down closely, and look at it. It looks like the cobblestones of this particular district, and it's only really towards the top of this hill, where all the rest of these buildings are constructed, has a

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I wander over to the big hole in the ground and ask one of the guards: Oi! What's in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you walk up, two of the guards give you a keen look and put their hands on the sides of their sheathed weapons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No worries. I'm from out of town. I just was very curious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look at each other and some of the more-- for lack of a better term, more academic looking individuals-- shy away from this seemingly growing possible confrontation, from their perspective. They begin to pull back and walk down this slightly descending, spiral-like path, that's about ten feet off the inside of this carving into the floor. They begin to descend down into it. One of the guards says, "This is where the Allegiance is currently excavating."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. And the Allegiance is the people who live here? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Allegiance runs all of the schools here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course, yes, the schools for magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are not from here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am not, at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, please be on your way."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. Thank you for all of your helpfuw information. Helpfuw? Helpful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk and turn away, they keep a close eye as you step back into the open area of the square.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a big hole in the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was noticing. That's odd.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're esc-excavating something. I don't know what's happening to my brain!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Had a little bit of spice, have we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it look like a similar excavation site to the ziggurat in Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ziggurat is a subterranean chamber that was found through a long series of tunnels that were carved beneath a long swath of land, underneath Whitestone Castle, to the actual city of Whitestone. This appears to be just a large, strip mine-like cylinder that descends deep into the earth. You haven't been able to get close enough to look down toward the bottom of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How wide again, approximately?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 150 feet across. You're estimating from this distance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it looks excavated, and not just like something opened up and then they kept digging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You can see there is actually a pattern to the carving of the earth. It looks like it's been carved in, layer after layer after layer, much like a small-scale strip mine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do the stones look like they broke the ground, or does it look like the stones were actually built around this? Has this been here since the construction of this area? Or does it seem like perhaps in the last 20 years or such, they've just gone down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. It's a hole!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's hard to tell. For all your training in Whitestone, you haven't really been too keen on reading about the various details and specifications behind paving roads.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there whitestone located outside of Whitestone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not really, that I'm aware of. It rests beneath the tree, in the hills, in the mines to the north, and that's pretty much it that I'm aware of.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you would know about any dealings that Whitestone would have?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I would if I had paid attention to such things, but it wasn't something that I was-- I was very young the last time I was there. I don't really know where anything went, but I can assume that this came from Whitestone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bet they got this from Whitestone!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a bit of a stretch, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is interesting. How did you come to that conclusion?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know, I just felt a little brain snap and then things danced between my ears and then it hit my mouth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should write that down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I Druidcraft a little gold star for him out of bark, and I say: Here you go, Grog! Good job! You have a gold star for the day!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do I do with this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just stick it right on your forehead!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or eat it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a crunching between his pearly white, larger-than-average goliath teeth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's find a big door, the biggest door we can find, and attack it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you head to the front gate you see the door there, and there are two small handles on the outside. You go to pull and it doesn't open.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I knock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's that iron-like vibration of a heavy gate. You wait a few moments, and in the distance, you see the large two doors to the chateau, one peeks open slightly and a little head peeks through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about, maybe, 50 feet from you at this distance, and he disappears back behind the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, hold up that necklace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, sorry. Distracted. Here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're here on official business. Matters of trade and of research.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door still remains ajar, but the figure has pulled back in. Are you shouting this at a distance?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I am. It will be very worth your while, and someone will definitely wish to speak with us. We've traveled from Tal'Dorei.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we just walk up to the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The head peeks out again and you get a better look at it this time. It's short, oval to the side almost? The head has this very wide, short, stocky, very pointed nose and a very pointed chin. No facial hair, however. Bald on top and what you see as a bit of grey hair that's frizzed on the sides. As it steps outside, you see its stature is similar to Scanlan's. This appears to be a gnomish individual. Pale skin, paler than most of you and definitely most people you've seen here in Ank'Harel and as it steps out, it has white robes with gray streaks across the front and back that fall into this cape in the back and with its arms placed within its robes. Its small footfalls comes across the path, over the bridge, up to the front of the gate and is now facing you guys on the other side of the gate. Up close, it is a

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello there, grandfather.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are looking for a bit of help. We've been told that your knowledge is great and we have some items that defy description.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you Headmaster James Kryon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I am not. I am Grymond Trog."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One more time, grandfather.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Grymond Trog."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grymond Trog. It's a pleasure to meet you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You, as well, and well met, whoever you are."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be pleased.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You don't have to do that here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could we meet with Headmaster James Kryon? We've been sent by someone very important. J'mon Sa Ord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From across the continent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I flash the thing again and say, in Gnomish: He'll want to talk to us. We've come a great distance to meet him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he responds in Gnomish to you, "Very well. I will go and see if the Headmaster is "available. I cannot promise anything, but I will return." You guys see this exchange in Gnomish. It sounds like (fast twittering).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've never heard you speak Gnomish before, Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What'd you say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) I said: Someone loan me 350 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 350 gold? Why 350 gold?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a very specific number.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a very interesting number.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The doors don't close; they remain ajar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's way faster than you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't you walk that fast, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm carrying two giant sacks of spice. It weighs me down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to put those in the bag of holding?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! They're mine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your cross to bear. Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wait about 15 minutes before the gnome, Grymond, pops his head out once more. "Just a "minute." Pops back in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like that little guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know; he's quite pleasing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pops back out about ten minutes later. Darts over to the edge. "My apologies for keeping you "waiting. The headmaster is unable to see visitors at the moment."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps try next week."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, that's such a long time. We have a very short amount of time; we're on a crunch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, is there a standby list we can get on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is there something I can help you with?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are sort of trying to save--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's very sweet."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight check him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Time is of the essence.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Loot Crate, ladies and gentlemen. I'm wearing one of the shirts right now. It came in this month's Loot Box! Loot Crate, I think it's called, actually, not a Loot Box.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hear it comes with a gram of spice in every box.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Every box. In some circles. Oh boy, Travis is looking! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look, we're in a bit of a rush. This is very important business. The fate of the world rests on your shoulders.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Persuasion check. She's the best at those!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not terrible at it. 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His eyes blink. Sigh. "Just a moment." Turns around and disappears back up the walkway to the building. You wait another

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking little gnome on a power trip.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Worth it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we asking when we get in, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wait another ten minutes, and right as your frustration is beginning to mount and you're ready to start rattling that gate, you see a figure, much taller, step out from the open door to the front of the Crystal Chateau.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eyes up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually comes to the edge of the gate. "My "apologies for the delay. Apparently, you have both the assistance of the soul of the jeweled city at "your disposal, and you've convinced my clerk that you have important business. Well, you have ten "minutes of my time. What can I do for you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: May we speak in private for that ten minutes? It is sensitive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well." He snaps his fingers and utters this incantation under his mouth. Suddenly you have this crackling blue wall appear above you, and you all are encased inside this cube-like box, it's about 25 by 25 feet, you hear this slight vibration crackling around you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the fence still between us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) For at least the time he's willing to give you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you know of the news of Tal'Dorei and Emon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't really pay attention to matters that far from where we are. I have important "things to tend to."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Foreign affairs, obviously. But I can see that there are aspects of this place that are foreign, that you have brought culture here. And I pull out one of my guns, pull it out to show him the hiltwork, which is all embedded with actual whitestone. I cannot speak the name of where we come from, but I know how this place was built, and I know that perhaps we have a connection because of it. And I'm going to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dragons are ravaging the continent. A chromatic conclave of dragons, unlike we've ever seen before, have decimated the cultures of the other end of the earth. Dragons we have never seen before, but you have. And I'm going to Minor Illusion in my hand an image of the red dragon with the ruby in his chest sitting atop. I'm creating a little visual of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's rudimentary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's rudimentary, but it's there. It's obviously an illusion; it's not meant to look real. It's fuzzy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a Princess Leia, froze, coming out of R2D2 in A Lost Hope. Takes a look at it, seemingly unmoved, and goes, "And?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They will come here. They will come here and they will ravage. We've been given the opportunity and the hope of stopping them before they reach your shores.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have ended two of them, and we want to end them all before they come anywhere near these shores.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That sounds like an absolutely remarkable endeavor and I wish you the best of luck."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we could just have a bit of help, identifying a few objects of magical power, and hopefully finding a few more keys to stopping them, it would ingratiate us to you so much that I would be delighted to speak of a future of hopefully making sure that more of this beautiful whitestone that you use everywhere in this beautiful palace is available and deeply indebted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do say whitestone, his eyes for the first time do lock into yours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Tell him who you are, Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cannot tell him who I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. You now have six more minutes of my time. If you are here for simple identification "purposes, I can aid you in this. What would you like me to see for you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They are not simple. We are not starting with the jug.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Step up, Grog. Show him the gloves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yes. I got these Titanstone Knuckles off my uncle. They make me bigger and stronger, but I'm not sure what else they do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed they are. A Vestige! I have not seen one in "person. Congratulations. That is a very worthy find. There are museums and collectors that would "pay quite a penny for such an item."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm not interested in selling it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you have heard of these Vestiges before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have come across them in my research, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have three of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you heard of one called Cabal's Ruin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've heard of it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a cloak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Show him your bow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Our second Vestige.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leans forward, this time with one hand and touches the edge of it. As he touches the edge, it curls against the tip of his finger and he pulls back, a little bit creeped out by it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fenthras.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fenthras." And his eyes flash again. The bow seems to stop moving for a second and then relax back into its slow, organic movement. "This is also quite a find. A powerful weapon. Fey in "nature. It seems to extend sight and grow that which it slays." He gives you information on each of these Vestiges as part of his Identify spell, and there is no additional information beyond what you already know about the item.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I misspoke. We have four. Scanlan, show him your blade.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) Mythcarver!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (French accent) "Mythcarver?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is how some would say it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes it. His eyes flash again as he glances over the blade. "One of the non "divine-based Vestiges. Here you are. Much like those knuckles."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Non-divine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Some were created in the sphere of some deity's influence. Some were created by powerful "practitioners of the arcane. Remember, the Calamity, the battle that sparked the Divergence "itself, was a battle against the gods, against wayward arcane magics, and the division between "the societal belief in both."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did anyone in the Allegiance create these items?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, the Allegiance has only been around for about 80, 90 years. But some of us have come "across information about these, as scattered as they are."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have the tea set, as well? Do we have anything else?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you tell me anything more about the blade?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It resonates with sound and speech and song." He gives you basically the information you have about the Mythcarver.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably overkill, but I draw back the white that I'm wearing. What of this armor? Can you tell me anything about it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interesting."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that something that any of these would do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not know. This is my first time actually handling any Vestiges. For the record, "you carrying this many puts quite a target on your back from anyone who's interested in selling them "or making them their own. I would recommend not telling anyone what you have in your possession."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are the only one that we've told.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good, keep it that way."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a few more things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull out the tea set that has LM engraved on it, that we got in--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unfortunately, you've expended most of my identification this day."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Less of a magical investigation, then. I pull out a piece of the green elemental shard from Whitestone and show it to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Might I have a look at that?" He takes it, reaches into his robes, pulls out a very well-crafted glass jeweler's piece, glances over it for a second. He clicks a small button on the side of it. Each time he does, you see the lens change color on the end of it. "I have not seen "anything like this. Not of condensed, purified whitestone."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. I take it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you take it, he gives a little resistance, "The possibilities of such a substance "is intriguing."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do an insight check on him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we ask him how he got his purple hair? Because I want some purple hair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make sure to visit the Geek and Sundry store for all of our new merch items!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Espionage nail wraps!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got these new bitching bracelets!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But these have Critical Role themes to them!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look, Sam, we have a Critical Role mug!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No way, that's really available? I want one! How much are they? $50, $100? Just $20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Think of all the spice you could get!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Should you have any more that you do not require, I am sure I could convince the Allegiance "to pay quite a hefty sum."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are under siege. But cooperation and help in our endeavor certainly does. The process is known to my people and a closely guarded secret, obviously. We would be happy to restore normal relations once we are no longer in danger. Excited for normal relations, and proper trade. We are a city in need.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I may have your name, then, sir?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do not give him my name, but I put together a quick piece of paper with the royal seal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He takes it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's enough that you need not have any paper proof of who I am, other than the fact that if this place was built, then that should be very useful to you. If this place was built the way we expect. If we survive, and especially with your cooperation and help, we will be back to this city, and we will be grateful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can always come back with more of this condensed whitestone in tow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very expensive and very rare, sadly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I look forward to your return once this wyrm intrusion is completed, and we can discuss "business."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Worm intrusion? Oh, the wyrm. I thought you were talking about the hole out front. Is that anything we can help with? We're quite adept.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, we're good, but thank you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hate to wear out our welcome, but you said you were spent. Is it possible your friend who scuttled off could have a look at my sister's tea set?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really, they are so smart and magical--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are asking us to spend this last minute of time that I've promised to you to retrieve my "clerk to see what your tea set does?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was asking that, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I have a question. Would you ever engage in matters outside of this stupid-ass place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Referring to what?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, other countries, people in danger, dragons. You seem to be a powerful magician of some sort. Would you ever help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not, nor does the Allegiance, get involved in political matters. We are simply a "collection of scholars and we attempt to keep it that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In your scholarly knowledge, do you know how to kill a red dragon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With no heart?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would say that is probably a bit beyond my capability. But if, indeed, that little bauble "that your tiny friend carries is to believe true, I think you've already found favors and allies far "beyond anything we could provide."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need everything we can get, and we are down several libraries on our continent. They do enjoy watching the knowledge of the ages burn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, perhaps you should get on seeing them felled fairly soon, then."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hopefully, take this as the fair warning that it was meant to be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The city has seen quite a few aggressors, and not one has made it farther than the outside walls."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I have heard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But this isn't one. This is several.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that is why they have given us their favors, because they understand that this threat is greater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And yet you have already felled a few yourselves. I am certain you will be "successful in the rest of your endeavor."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One last note. You mentioned Cabal's Ruin? Have you heard of the Den of Druja?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Druja? Yes, that was naught but 60 years ago. There was a bit of an incursion, an uprising, "of a guild that was getting a bit big for its britches and was muscling its way through most of "the Suncut Bazaar. Some sort of a conflict arose, and the streets were lined with bodies at certain "moments. However, it seems that they were dealt with rather quickly, succinctly. One of our "wayward mages that had apparently been helping helm this endeavor was brought to justice with a "blade to his throat."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really? What was the name of this sorcerer? Magician? Mage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean no disrespect to you, but it is a place of particular sourness and shame within the "Allegiance, and we wish to move on from it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. But isn't knowledge like this best known so that history does not repeat itself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We know it well, and it will not be repeated. I do not know you, yet you ask us "questions deep within our history that we do not wish to discuss for our own reasons."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lot of answers we got here. Lot of answers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we just asked the wrong questions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe I should just ask him to identify this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you've already burned the charge on that one for the day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you put your finger up, he puts up three fingers. "And that is your ten minutes. Thank you "so much for your time. Please, do make sure the Allegiance knows once you've completed your "journey up in wherever these dragons are and return. I think there are many things we could "discuss, to the benefit of both you and us. Now, I have things to attend to. I wish you good day."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good day to you, sir.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You ruined your business deal. Have fun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He counted ten like this! I thought they were

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, he exits back and the door closes shut.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That guy was a dick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, he was, but we did learn some things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To be fair, we were asking him favors for no benefit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is true, but he was a snob.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was plenty of benefit to him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't do well with snobbery.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to burn down his house?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Triceratops! Triceratops! All right, easy, killer, easy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, so, we know a little bit more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, a little bit more. We need to find out who this mage was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Den of Druja was a guild. 60 years ago, though. That's quite a long time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to reach out to this woman, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe she's really old.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do know where she lives.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could go and check, and we could hang back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have contacts in the underworld here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They respect you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The name of the Meat Man goes a long way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This time, the four hours lost since waking, you're probably pushing 2:00 in the afternoon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go pay a visit to what's-her-butt? What's our play here? We need her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need Cabal's Ruin. But we don't want to cause too much of a ruckus, because I don't want to put ourselves at odds with J'mon Sa Ord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we should find out more about this Den of Druja. It sounds like there was quite a civil war that happened back in the day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we make a mistake here? Should we have said something else? But what information could this person have given us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Access to a library?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we had more of that stuff from Percy's place, he'd be more willing to share.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy, can you give him that piece?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't trust him with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't imagine why.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was definitely very interested in it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could sneak in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. How?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could just go down the hole. See what's there. Kiki and I could be dragonflies and just buzz on down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true, you're little drones!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is an entire area of mages! You don't think they'll notice when you use Polymorph?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Magical effect, just so you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just organic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's organically natural.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Free-range magic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So our options are go down the hole, get caught; go find the girl with the cloak--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get caught.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or all bum rush my friends at the casino, and get

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just 50 gold. I don't see why you're getting so uptight about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was my lucky gold piece that I got.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why would you spend your lucky gold piece?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was buried in with the rest. I didn't notice it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, maybe if you just ask them to give it back--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are really uptight about this!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need a nap, that's all. I need a nap.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about we go up to the woman, then, if the hole sounds like a bad idea?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's make our way over that way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, sneaky sneaker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I can take us there. Do we want to be genuine and knock on the door? I can't think that it's going to be useful to go sneaking in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe she's taken the cloak off and we can take it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, there's also one other. We've heard that there's shady people at the-- Wait, have we been to the Debt's Respite?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's where we're staying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's our hotel, Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He drank a bit last night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, do you need to go find a house of lady favors?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Hilton by the airport, not downtown.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got a full night's sleep, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax, do you feel like we should be door-knockers instead of sneakers?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like door-knocker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's knock on Mistress Asharru's door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, we're just going to go knock and say what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Hey can we have your Vestige that's super valuable?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we could trade her one!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your idea?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have no idea. Maybe wait until she comes to find us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could do some recon on her place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take a look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys all heading there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think we should do that. So that Grog doesn't knock over a whole cart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are going to definitely hang about a block back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you and I should go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. We're good at it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could go up to the front door and pretend to be a FedEx delivery guy or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pick up Scanlan like a football and walk off with my sister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There appears to be some crates. There's some barrels around this small building that reads, on the sign above the door, A Kingly Home. The door is closed. There appears to be a window right next to the door. There is the series of barrels, and there's the one barrel you saw where the individual moved it and placed the actual request that you guys made through a small slot in the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any other people around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see-- actually, everyone roll a stealth check, who's coming through. Yeah, you guys are behind, so the three of you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not you, Grog. You're not going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This part of the city doesn't see a lot of foot traffic, which is probably why it makes for a nice home for an individual that does shady work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And nobody's hiding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys take the next few minutes quietly off in the shadows, looking about the upper and lower regions of this small alcove where the house is. About four or five minutes into that, you're pretty certain that nobody here is hidden and you are alone other than the home, at least for the time being.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I just go knock on the front door?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was my suggestion, but I thought we came here to watch for a bit. I say to Scanlan, sitting on my shoulders.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, you can turn into a bug or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whatever you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I can use-- wait, does this have to be--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think bug.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bug? You want bug?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This doesn't have to be attuned. I have, from a long fucking time ago, the cloak of the scuttling rat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't even know what that is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does it require attunement?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have a cloak attuned to you right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't have a cloak attuned to me because--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's correct, you do not. So yeah, you could put that on if you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This says five minutes of rat form. Scanlan can go all night long.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know why they call her Vex the Rat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know why they call her that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to do a bug? Be a bug? All right, I'll be a beautiful dragonfly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (buzzing) Scanlan becomes this dragonfly with gorgeous, rainbow-like color and a tiny little beret. What do you want to do, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look for any openings in the windows or vents--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You (tink) against the glass. The window is closed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a fireplace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is actually pretty flush with the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chimneys? Air intakes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over the top of the roof. There actually is no chimney.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right, so then I'll just hang out by a window for a little bit and look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the little thing where the note got slipped in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know anything about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch the dragonfly (tink)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I see anyone in any of the windows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's dark inside. The drapes are drawn except for a little bit of a sliver where the light would get through. You see a little peek of a wooden floor, but there's no light from the inside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Just going to go all the way around the house, high and low, looking for a way in. Do I find it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A lot. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. After coming around, you begin to slink around by the barrels and you can see, in the stonework that has been built, the masonry that forms the exterior of the building, there appears to be a very small hole, about cork-size, hidden behind one of the barrels in the front. There's just enough space between the wall where you can barely squeeze in and poke through. It's big enough where your wings will hit, so you have to attach to it and crawl through before coming out the other side. As you come out the other side, you're now inside the house. Dark interior. Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're inside the building, but it is very dark. All you see is the one little beam of light coming through the window that is facing where the sun currently is in the sky and is creating the one beam on the ground and the little bit of wood that's there. That's as much as you can make out at the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will fly around and see if I knock into anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go over it. You glance over and a little bit of light is bouncing off the sunbeam. You can see, beneath the opening where you came in, the rolled-up scroll, that was placed inside the small case that held your guys' message, is still resting right beneath the opening, untouched.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, they haven't even opened it? Assholes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe she hasn't been home.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I in a room that's closed off? Can I keep going through the house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a big part of the house you haven't explored yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll see if I can make my way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It's fairly dark in here. Let me check one thing in the monster manual. I'm just going to see if there's some possibility--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I doubt dragonflies are even in the monster manual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but I'm looking for--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The thing that's about to eat you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look for dragon perception.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A dire dragonfly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Honestly, thinking about it here, you probably might have blindsight from a lot of different insects.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They've got the big prismatic hoo-ha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm not an expert on insect biology. As you putter around to the opposite side of the room, you can see there is a small table. There is a very simple bed on the side. There is a carpet that has been pulled and half-folded over. There is an opening on the floor on the opposite corner, a staircase that descends below, and a trapdoor that is left open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! I go outside immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You find the opening, pull through, and then come through on the opposite side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I bamf out. There's a trapdoor. We've got to go down the trapdoor. No one's in the house! We can just go in, snickety-snack! Let's go in, go down the trapdoor, see what it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are three of us running in after--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They'll make noise! You, me, and you, we're the stealthy ones.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is true, but we don't know what is in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you're right. We should totally tell the others.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hello, everyone. What's going on? Are things going on? Hello?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan is still grappling with some sort of depression.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got a bipolar thing going on, manic-depressive episode.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what any of that means.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it the spice? Are you having a rough morning from the spice?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyway. There's a trapdoor. We should go down it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trapdoor?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see any sign of life inside the house?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I did. I saw the sign that someone had opened a trapdoor and gone down it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They could be hurt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They could just have a basement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could be breaking into somebody's home for nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We either sit on our asses waiting for this woman, or we go make shit happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're on a time crunch. Let's make shit happen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An entire city may die if we take too long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we look around? Is anyone around? Can we pick this lock without anybody knowing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give my sister and I a minute and then join us. Oh, we left them way behind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we have time to go get more slushy beverages?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, Keyleth. No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You work on the lock. I'm going to go get the rest. I'm going to head back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Vax, you head back. You get the rest of the party. Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see anyone around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wait a minute for them to just pass by, and as soon as they're out of earshot, you head back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I check for traps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well. That investigation was a 12, there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't appear to be trapped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to try to pick this lock, Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we look around the streets?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I totally checked already. I'm going to try and pick this lock. I'm going to try real hard. What do I roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, this would be a sleight of hand. Not sleight of hand. No, this is a lock-pick tool, a thieves' tools check. So you add your proficiency bonus and your dexterity bonus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Add my proficiency bonus? I don't understand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thieves' tools.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have thieves' tools!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your proficiency bonus is five, right? And what's your dexterity bonus?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, my dexterity is another five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So add ten to your d20 roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that's a 14 that I rolled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so plus ten, 24. Oh, four plus ten? You put your lock pick inside. As simple as it looks from the outside, it's a very intricate lock. You spend about five minutes with it. You're not getting any of the tumblers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But don't tell my brother I couldn't unlock this, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, first I'm going to try to pick the lock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have thieves' tools? Then go fuck yourself. You can't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just roll a d20 and add your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four. All right, I'll just go in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pulls out a couple of barely unfurled pieces of wire, puts them in there for a second, and they both break inside of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I will Dimension Door inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're now inside. As you go back to the door, you can see there is a heavy latch and some sort of a padlock on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Goddamn it. On the inside?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have I gotten back to the rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have gotten back pretty quick, full speed. You guys, over the next two minutes or so, the rest of the party gets there. You can go ahead and make another shot. The DC is going to increase, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try it again. Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. It's an alarm. We need to get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No noise. Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we forget to check for traps again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I did. I checked! 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? Ah, as Scanlan from the inside and you on the outside, you take a quick glance inside, just scanning around. You can see bed on the far side, the trapdoor that's open, the stairs that lead down. What catches your eye is right around the outside of the entrance to the basement, you see these dark spots across the ground that generally fade as they reach the door that you're at. These are familiar spots. These are tiny little spatters of viscera, blood. Dried.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Leading from the door to the trapdoor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leading from the trapdoor to the door, dissipating as it comes to your door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, and it's dried?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it's been there for a while, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. So the trap could've done something to somebody before?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, more blood toward the trapdoor and then it fades, so someone came out of the trapdoor--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And tried to haul ass out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was the flash?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An alarm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see footprints around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you get close and look down, you can see, in a couple of the dried blood smears, there appear to be footprints in them that are heading out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go over to the trapdoor and inspect it for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The trapdoor is still open. It's left open and the stairs that descend. There is no trap in the vicinity. Looks like it's been untouched for a while. You guys are just now starting to approach the outside of the house. As you get there, you see the door is partially ajar, and it is open, and you can vaguely see movement on the inside of Vex and Scanlan looking about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nice job, ace. What's going on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There was a trap. I think there was a trap on it and I didn't know. But I looked for traps! There was a flash. Does that sound familiar?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is anyone new on the streets or on the roofs above us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I look down the road, because I'm down a bit, see if anyone looks like they're coming this way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The three of you looking about. There are some people in the distance that pass by three alleys down, but there's nobody paying attention to or immediately in the vicinity of this little alcove. Nothing unusual.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan's by the open trapdoor inside?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to nonchalantly walk in, open the door, and just we'll all come in and shut the door behind us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there any blood on the inside of the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you look on the inside of the door, there is actually a hand print in blood against the top of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like it was trying to open the door? Does it look like it got the door open, or it was stuck inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it looks like, as it wraps around the top, it looks like somebody had lifted it up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, the trapdoor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there blood on the handle? Is there blood on the door itself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at the inside handle, there are very faint traces of dried blood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a check on the outside threshold of the door to see if I can see the blood go outward?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go and grab our note that we sent and take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you put it away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will check for that, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are out in the open right now, slowly inspecting the ground in the middle of this alley.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 11. I'm at the door looking out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going down the trapdoor carefully.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, we're all inside, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're all inside. Vax is vanishing down the trapdoor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm doing a quick, gentle sweep of the room, looking for any invisible bodies in the corner. Just moving my hand around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys are scanning this, Vax, you head down into the bottom. Beneath this small hovel in this trapdoor, the stairs stop and to the left of you there is another door that is partially left open into another chamber that is beneath.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to look for traps on the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is open, but yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, but there could still be. Okay, investigation, right? 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does not appear to be trapped.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm still stealthed? I'm going to gently open the door and peer in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull it open, look inside. This is a larger chamber with a much better set of furniture. It looks like the woman that you had hired probably lived here more than above. You see what would be weapons racks, but have been cleaned out. You see a couple of lanterns that are placed upon a table in the corner that have since burned out. One of them has actually fallen over, and it appears the glass is broken on the ground. Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing across the room, you can see more of the thicker blood spatters with other footprints in them. Multiple footprints. You see a body, still, on the other side of the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, somebody else got the Vestige.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Multiple stabs, one in her throat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can anyone talk to her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike's not here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are the rest of you guys coming down to see this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm heading down if everybody else is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look around. Any evidence left behind of who it was that attacked her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation checks for the guys who are checking the room. What are you guys checking?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to check her further.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check on the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to see if they've turned the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to see if I can find something left behind by the killers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm looking for other exits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 21 on her form.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm looking for treasures.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 21 as well, looking at the house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Investigation? 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll? 21? 15? You're having a hard time finding anything that really specifically represents that scuffle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bring Trinket out and have him sniff around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trinket begins sniffing around the room. Keyleth, you find a series of puncture marks in the walls themselves, in some of the dirt and stone parts of the wall, some small stab puncture wounds across the wall in different places.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just to be safe, I'm going to close the trap door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it dark down here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is pitch dark. Percy, for the most part, you don't have any sort of sight--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it safe for me to throw out a Daylight spell? I throw up a Daylight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The room now illuminates, and you all have a very clear perspective on this. You, inspecting the body, the puncture wounds that are in the front have corresponding puncture wounds in the back as well. You can see clasps on the shoulders where a cloak would be affixed, but the clasps have been broken off and there is no cloak there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any treasures in the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll for an investigation check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? Most of the room has been completely ransacked. It looks like there were places where some things might have been useful, but they have been taken. You find a couple of discarded jewel boxes or lockboxes that have since been broken open and left with a couple scattered gold coins here and there, but this place has been completely cleaned out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was looking for other exits and entrances to the building all around, and I rolled a 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There looks to be one hidden passage behind this one cabinet, where all the drawers have been pulled out and left on the ground empty, but behind that there is a small tunnel that exits outward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To the street?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. As you're inspecting it, you're seeing more and more of these, each one of these puncture marks that hit the front, also correspond to the back. It's a clear wound through each way and it appears to be a burn around the outside of each one of these punctures.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I haven't looked at them yet, and there's no reason to look until someone, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival, come here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I have Trinket sniff around for anything that doesn't smell like her? For other people?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perce? This looks like your work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Advantage on smell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take a look at the body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are very familiar with these type of wounds. Corresponding to the punctures you've seen in the wall behind, you go back, check, and begin to pry in, and you pull out small, iron balls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull it out, and I hand it to Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that was quick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry. I guess our girl is back in our narrative.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the best case scenario.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So hang on. Which hand is Ripley missing? Right hand? What hand print is on the trapdoor? Is it a left hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a left hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did she even know about this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's been doing a lot of research, and she's been following our exploits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's probably spying on me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We know she's a huge fan of Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Waiting for me to build something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Single Whitestone Female?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe Mistress Asharru wasn't wearing the cloak. Maybe she happened to hide it down the tunnel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I found a secret exit that someone could have used to come in and kill, or exit after, or maybe not at all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there exit wounds on the back of the body as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are, yes. Corresponding exit wounds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll walk over to Scanlan. I'm going in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys follow this tunnel. It's a very small tunnel, and it continues on for a very intense period of time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Trap check! That is a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keeping your eyes up as you continue along, you do not find any traps. Eventually it comes up and stops. There above, you can see there's a small series of hand platforms or grooves in the wall that lead up to this cylinder and above you can see a grate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Start climbing up it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You climb up and push off there. You come out. Just glancing up very carefully over the side, you see an opening into the Suncut Bazaar, just outside of an alleyway that opens up into the rest of the chaos.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need to find her before she figures out a way to return.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get the word out about what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's still in this city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was over a week ago potentially. She could be long gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The leader of one of the largest criminal masterminds is now dead in the city. We have to find the murderer. What do we say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long has the body been here? A week? I'll talk to my contacts in the underworld.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If it's a week, Ripley could be anywhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did Trinket smell anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket did not, actually. Trinket had a rough time trying to just get the bearings and find anything specific.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hippety-hop back down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you head back and join the group.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could at least ask around and see if anyone has-- But she disguises her appearance, doesn't she?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's got a missing arm, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but she was able to hide that before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The guard at that one place. I feel like it was her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not Ripley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys sit here and contemplate the various possibilities as to who is responsible for this, where they may be, why, and if they indeed have this Vestige in their grasp, we'll end tonight's session there and pick this up next week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a murder mystery now!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hold onto those bullets. I might be able to track her down, because they belonged to her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice job, Matt!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice job creating an entire casino, including brand new games!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to play more!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've figured out how to strategize! Your dice game has a base strategy, which is only double down on a six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's actually right. Then you have a one in three chance of actually hitting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I rolled a seven!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, okay, it's not real.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, but I want to play this game all the time. I just rolled a seven. I'm counting as a win.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should really go back to this casino and ask around for Ripley, maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah and then just gamble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe. Just to win favor with the locals.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I suck with cops. I get thrown out everywhere I go. It's great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you lawyered her out of jail before. Thanks, Loot Crate! Don't forget about the awesome stuff that's in the store!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Espionage!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, Espionage, thank you so much!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, nail wraps!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [end of captions]
